familyQuotes.quote: Indeed, nothing is more critically connected to happiness—both our own and that of our children—than how well we love and support one another within the family.
familyQuotes.author: M. Russell Ballard

familyQuotes.quote: The family is the most important organization in time or in eternity. Our purpose in life is to create for ourselves eternal family units.
familyQuotes.author: Joseph Fielding Smith
